ksdk:manifest.name: MEK-MIMX8QM
ksdk:manifest.brief: This is SDK version 2.5.2 manifest file. It describes the content of the MEK-MIMX8QM and additional settings for tools that support SDK version 2.5.2

board.name: MEK-MIMX8QM
board.description: The mekmimx8qm is an development platform for MIMX8QM MPUs

specific.content: The i.MX 8QuadMax Multisensory Enablement Kit (MEK) is an evaluation platform for the i.MX 8QuadMax Application Processor. Hardware defign files, software tools and board support packages(BSPs) for Linux Android, and FreeRTOS are availabe for customers to use as a reference for starting design of their products.

device.name: MIMX8QM6
device.description: The MIMX8QM contains ARM Cortex-M4 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.

specific.content: The MIMX8QM contains ARM Cortex-M4 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.
